reviewText: These Cheezy (Insert Genre) Trailers DVDs don't seem to rate very highly, and I can't really refute much of the criticism I've seen. I don't mind the grainy picture quality and the jumps myself, these little defects add to the grindhouse vibe of the thing. I collect trailer compilations, and, yes, some of the previews on offer are pretty well-travelled. But there are plenty that were new to me, too. And when you can pick 'em up for $2 a throw, why not?
